00040 #ifndef AMP_amp_internal_winthreads_critical_section_config_H
00041 #define AMP_amp_internal_winthreads_critical_section_config_H
00042 
00043 
00044 #define AMP_RAW_MUTEX_WINTHREADS_CRITICAL_SECTION_ZERO_SPIN_COUNT 0
00045 #define AMP_RAW_MUTEX_WINTHREADS_CRITICAL_SECTION_DEFAULT_SPIN_COUNT 1500
00046 
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Flag or-ed into the spin count when calling 
00050  * @c InitializeCriticalSectionAndSpinCount . On Win2000 the flag triggers
00051  * an immediate initialization instead of the Win2000-typical lazy 
00052  * initialization to prevent later otherwise possible exceptions when entering
00053  * or leaving the CRITICAL_SECTION. Later Windows version won't throw 
00054  * exceptions and ignore the high bit set by this flag.
00055  * 
00056  * See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms683476(VS.85).aspx for details.
00057  */
00058 #define AMP_RAW_MUTEX_WINTHREADS_CRITICAL_SECTION_CREATE_IMMEDIATELY_ON_WIN2000 0x080000000
00059 
00060 
00061 #endif /* AMP_amp_internal_winthreads_critical_section_config_H */
